2020 UDO COMPARATIVE TABLE
This table gives the location within the Unified Development Code of those ordinances and amendments adopted prior to Supplement No. 7 of this Code. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the Code Comparative Table immediately following this table.
